__e: - Stop it, I may not forgive you again.
- I know, I know. - Shut up. You don't know anything yet.
Among the crosses that rise on the hill of Keriath, there is also mine.
Quiet, you shouldn't tire yourself talking.
-Poor cécile. - Shut up, you said that before.
Shut up, you honky scum bastard mother!
Will you kindly hold that agile tongue and listen to me?
Please- Shut up and do as I tell you!
If someone knows something, make a note and come back with!
Will you kindly hold that agile tongue and listen to me?
